title: Recording stops randomnly
body:
Hello

Android 4.0.4
The barometer reading recording stops randomly. I haven't be able to pinpoint the succession of events that triggers the interruption. I believe that the recording is active as long as the application is in the background, and stops when the Android system clears the application from the background ? Could the solution be to have the application working as a service?

Regards

title: Android automatic refactor - Recycle
body:
Hi,

I am developing a tool to automatically refactor Android applications with the goal of improving energy efficiency.
This pull request has the changes generated while applying the rule "Recycle".

Some resources (e.g., ```Cursor``` instances) should be closed when they are no longer necessary.

I have made a previous validation of the changes and they seem correct.
Please consider them and let me know if you agree with them.

Best,
Luis

title: Light Green sometimes is difficult to read
body: The light green chart sometimes is difficult to read

title: Tested with Marshmallow?
body: Since I upgraded my phone to Marshmallow AtmosphereLogger stopped recording data
